trans-unit.source: Represents a set of selected dates in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
Dates can be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.

Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, adding a date or a range to the SelectedDatesCollection may cause it to be cleared.
The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property.
|CalendarSelectionMode|Effect on SelectedDates| |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.

<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.

Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.

Adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> associated with this collection.
Adds all the dates in the specified range, which includes the first and last dates, to the collection.
The first date to add to the collection.
The last date to add to the collection.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
